events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering, focusing on backend software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in software engineer roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening was completed successfully, and you meet the required engineering qualifications.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the next steps in the software engineer recruitment process.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead developer for May 10th at 9 AM UTC.
You completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong programming skills and problem-solving ability.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You successfully completed the HR interview and expressed great alignment with our engineering team values.
We have sent you an official job offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback regarding the job offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
Thank you for accepting the job offer; we are excited to welcome you aboard as our new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started; you will receive all necessary information to begin your role successfully.
The hiring process is officially closed, and you are now a full member of our engineering team.
